name: Autobiographical game - 23:59
description:
• Please use your headphones
  • Click & click on the items/bubbles, just keep clicking & waiting
  • Input your name & location in the last scene to become part of the game
  • Around 10 minutes

----

Tried to:

  • Use colors and sound effects to hint at the moods/emotional feelings.
  • Play with the usual elements of visual novels, design interactions that better convey the intended struggling feelings.
  • Make players part of the game (the ending scene)

Unity:

  • Got familiar with Textmesh pro & unity events

Some issues:

  • The difference between mouse-tabs with touch-pads and mouse-clicks with mouses (While GetMouseButtonDown detects both actions, GetMouseButton doesn't seem to react to held-down actions from touch-pads on mac?)
  • The cursor sprite sometimes doesn't change properly, especially on mac.
